sentences.en: 'They say , those boastful English, that it is the Refuge of many.
sentences.cn: “ 那些喜欢吹牛的英国人说它是许多人的避难所.

sentences.en: " I won't,'said Carrie, feeling no refuge but in anger.
sentences.cn: “ 我不愿意说, "嘉莉回答.她感到除了发脾气,她无法躲闪.

sentences.en: A small minority takes refuge ( as it always has ) in mindless radicalism.
sentences.cn: 少数人在毫不理智的激进主义里寻找安慰 ( 他们历来如此 ).

sentences.en: All taking refuge in here, eh ?
All too often, they get bored, and seek refuge in drink and drugs.
sentences.cn: 太多的时候，他们觉得无聊就在酒精和毒品中寻求慰藉。

sentences.en: As the buildings rocked under heavy shell-fire, he took refuge in the cellars.
sentences.cn: 当一座座楼房在猛烈的炮火中颤动摇晃时，他躲进了地下室。

sentences.en: Father Rowan took refuge in silence.
sentences.cn: 罗恩神父以沉默来逃避。

sentences.en: Four people who sought refuge in the Italian embassy have left voluntarily.
sentences.cn: 4名在意大利大使馆寻求避难的人已经自愿离开了。

sentences.en: His home became a place of refuge for the believers.
sentences.cn: 他的家成了信徒们的避难之处。

sentences.en: In the storm we took refuge under a big tree.
sentences.cn: 在那次暴风雨中,我们躲在一棵大树下.

sentences.en: That the word " Mafia " had originally meant place of refuge.
sentences.cn: 他还摸清了 “ 黑帮”这个词在意大利语里原来的含义是 “ 避难所”.

sentences.en: They took refuge in a bomb shelter.
We climbed up a winding track towards a mountain refuge.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着一条蜿蜒的小道爬向山上的一处避难所。

sentences.en: We took refuge in the lee of the wall.
sentences.cn: 我们在墙的背风处暂避.

sentences.en: When I am sad, I take refuge in remembering happier times.
sentences.cn: 当我悲伤时, 就从回忆过去快乐的时光中寻求安慰.

trans.tran_cn: 避难，避难所，庇护者，[医]救急疗法
trans.tran_en: shelter or protection from someone or something
